alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 6:40PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Barnwell, northwestern Bamberg, east central Aiken and west central Orangeburg Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 640 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Williston, or 15 miles north of Barnwell, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Williston, Blackville, Barnwell State Park, Springfield, Salley, Elko and Aiken Gopher Tortoise Heritage Preserve. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Aiken; Bamberg; Barnwell; Central Orangeburg; Northwestern Orangeburg
